name: Tater Tot® and Bacon Breakfast Casserole
author: SPezz
summary: A yummy breakfast dish that's quick to throw together and great for guests or for Christmas morning.
ingredients: 1 (32 ounce) package frozen bite-size potato nuggets (such as Tater Tots®)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, 5 to 8 minutes
Spread bacon into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish to cover
Spread potato nuggets over the bacon
Beat eggs, milk, salt, and pepper together in a bowl; pour over the layer of potato nuggets
Bake in the preheated oven until hot in the center, about 1 hour
